name: Cain's Habit
flavorText: Inspired by Deckard Cain's Horadric robes, these pants are perfect for those who, like Cain, have dedicated themselves to eradicating the demons' threat from this world.
flavorTextHtml: Inspired by Deckard Cain's Horadric robes, these pants are perfect for those who, like Cain, have dedicated themselves to eradicating the demons' threat from this world.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Attack Speed Increased by 8.0%    
 +50% Experience. (5.0% at level 70)(3) Set:     
 When a Greater Rift Keystone drops, there is a 25% chance for an extra one to drop. (Emanates)
